per_frame_init_1=clear = 1;
per_frame_init_2=xpos = .5;
per_frame_init_3=ypos = .75;
per_frame_init_4=state = 1;

per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=warp = 0;
per_frame_4=wave_a = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=x1 = .5;
per_frame_7=x2 = .785;
per_frame_8=x3 = .225;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=y1 = .75;
per_frame_11=y2 = .26;
per_frame_12=y3 = .26;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=state = if(equal(xpos,xrand)*equal(ypos,yrand),state+1,state);
per_frame_15=state = if(equal(state,4),1,state);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=xrand = if(equal(state,1),x1,if(equal(state,2),x2,x3));
per_frame_18=yrand = if(equal(state,1),y1,if(equal(state,2),y2,y3));
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=xrate = if(equal(state,laststate),xrate,(xrand-xpos)/60);
per_frame_21=yrate = if(equal(state,laststate),yrate,(yrand-ypos)/60);
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=xpos = xpos+xrate;
per_frame_24=ypos = ypos+yrate;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=q1 = (.5-xpos)*0.8*aspectx+.5;
per_frame_27=q2 = (.5-ypos)*0.8*aspecty+.43;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=laststate = state;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=q3 = 1-q1;
per_frame_32=q4 = 1-q2;
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=clear = 0;
